Item.description: Gulangyu Island is a lovely island that within just a short ferry ride for about 7~20 minutes from the ports in Xiamen downtown. It is also a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site that is mainly famous for its coastal beauty, colonial style architectures and a myriad of interesting museums, like piano museum, organ museum, etc. Bright sunlight, pleasant beaches, interesting buildings and museums and exquisite gardens, Gulangyu Island can fulfill all your dreams for a vacation!
